actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-814.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 292 - 92 (Record Vote No: 380).

official_title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 4868) to prohibit loans to, other investments in, and certain other activities with respect to, South Africa, and for other purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Provides for consideration of a motion to take H.R. 4868 (sanctions against South Africa) from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 4868) to prohibit loans to, other investments in, and certain other activities with respect to, South Africa, and for other purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.
